statements: SELECT * FROM viewer_behavior_tracking;
SELECT viewer_id, timestamp FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type = 'view';
SELECT viewer_id, action_type FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, timestamp, action_type FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM viewer_behavior_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, timestamp, content_id, action_type FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT viewer_id, action_type, timestamp, content_id FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, content_id, action_type, timestamp FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE content_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-543210987654' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE action_type IN ('view', 'like') AND content_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT viewer_id, action_type, timestamp FROM viewer_behavior_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-15 09:00:00' AND timestamp < '2023-01-16 18:00:00';
SELECT viewer_id, content_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM viewer_behavior;
SELECT content_id, recommended_content_id, recommendation_score, recommendation_timestamp FROM content_recommendations;
SELECT viewer_id, action_type, content_id, action_timestamp FROM viewer_behavior ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, recommendation_score, recommended_content_id, recommendation_timestamp FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT content_id, recommendation_score, recommended_content_id, recommendation_timestamp FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score < 0.3 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM viewer_behavior WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT viewer_id, content_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM viewer_behavior WHERE content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC
SELECT viewer_id, action_type, COUNT(*) as count_actions FROM viewer_behavior GROUP BY viewer_id, action_type ORDER BY count_actions DESC
SELECT content_id, recommended_content_id, recommendation_score FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT content_id, recommended_content_id, recommendation_score, recommendation_timestamp FROM content_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM viewer_behavior;
SELECT viewer_id, behavior_type FROM viewer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'LIKE';
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM content WHERE category = 'Action' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, recommended_content_id, timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE viewer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT viewer_id, COUNT(recommended_content_id) AS recommendations_count FROM recommendations GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING COUNT(recommended_content_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM viewer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'LIKE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT viewer_id, content.title, content.category, recommendations.timestamp FROM viewer_behavior JOIN content ON viewer_behavior.content_id = content.content_id JOIN recommendations ON viewer_behavior.viewer_id = recommendations.viewer_id ORDER BY recommendations.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT viewer_id, COUNT(content_id) AS total_views FROM viewer_behavior GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING total_views >= 3 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT content.title, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM content WHERE category = 'Action' GROUP BY content.title HAVING average_rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, recommended_content_id AS content_id, recommendations.timestamp AS recommendation_timestamp FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT content_id, rating FROM content_ratings WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT viewer_id, duration_minutes FROM viewer_activity ORDER BY date_viewed DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT content_id, genre, rating FROM content_ratings WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT viewer_id, content_id, date_viewed FROM viewer_activity ORDER BY date_viewed DESC;

SELECT v.viewer_id, v.age, c.genre, va.duration_minutes FROM viewer_demographics v JOIN viewer_preferences vp ON v.viewer_id = vp.viewer_id JOIN content_ratings c ON vp.content_id = c.content_id JOIN viewer_activity va ON v.viewer_id = va.viewer_id AND vp.content_id = va.content_id;
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_id, name, age FROM viewers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT video_id, title, category FROM videos ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT name, age FROM viewers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT title, category FROM videos ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
